website_summaries.verdict: With a wide nozzle for faster cleaning and useful handheld vacuum, this model boasts suction powerful enough to be useful on even short carpet.
pros: The handheld vac can be removed without losing any of this model's impressive suction power, which works on carpeted floors better than many stick vac models
The lightweight frame makes for an extremely mobile vacuum that can be moved easily around the home
cons: Some users report the filter requires frequent cleaning to maintain suction power

customer_reviews.title: Probably more effective indoors.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum performs admirably in adverse conditions. For three straight days it cleaned up all the filthy beats those DJs were dropping. The plastic window over the brush popped off at some point but being only a cosmetic blemish, it soldiered on and did not disappoint. To top it all off, the extended handle and brush are detachable, making it easier to clean up those hard-to-reach beats. They really had me in mind when they designed this product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: chip

customer_reviews.title: Very good for small areas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum to clean a few rugs I have at home for better cleaning. All our floors are ceramic tiled and laminated, so I need it for small tasks. I vacummed this carpet on the picture that I sweep daily, and it suctioned a lot of dirt from it. I gave my 2 dogs a hair cut, after sweeping their hair I used this vacuum for the left over hair, and it suctioned it all. It also has a spinning roll and you can turn it off / on according to the kind of floor you are cleaning. Over all, I think its good for small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yet another bad item.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dirt devil stick vac. I used it for less than a week then it started smoking and it died. I didn't pick up anything that should not have been vacuumed up. Only like dust on the floors. I am in a wheelchair and have no car and threw the box away so I couldn't return it. I have no car and don't know people with cars that could drive me to the post office. Or to do what I had to do to send it back. So I took yet another loss on an item that should still be working even today. Signed very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: chantel konopka

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is terrible! I moved to a small apartment and needed ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is terrible! I moved to a small apartment and needed something small and lightweight that could vacuum up dust and hair. I've used it about three times, and the last time I used it, the rotating brush head stopped working and there was no suction. I turned it off and waited for a few minutes and tried again. It would work for a few seconds and then stop vacuuming. It just spewed the dirt everywhere. Not happy with this product from Dirt Devil. Spend a bit more on a better product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Just got the device opened it immediately and started testing it and nothing actually was sucked into the machine. Was trying to pick up a little bit of hair nothing actually got into the trash receptacle. Some got stuck onto the brush which wasn't part of the suction it was just something that happened when I turned on the brush. Also it's making a lot of noise and feeling hot and a lot of hot air coming out of the little motor.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power for a handheld vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly as a handheld vacuum and not a push vacuum. This one is light enough for me to use extensively and it has great power compared to cordless ones. I still have it after 3 years and running strong. If this one die, I would buy the same one again. For the price it is a great tool that I use a lot when cleaning. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Vo

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks.... awesomely!
customer_reviews.text: I kept puttung the handle in the wedding way, but once I turned it front ways, it clicked right together. I had vacuumed the stairs and entry rug two days ago, but of course needed to do it again. Man did this thing SUCK! like every little thing got picked right up. You can see in the photo. My stairs and rug look great. You can shut off the brush to "swerp" the floor easily. The cord is long too, so I was able to finally reach all the stairs without unplugging and moving. It's also very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its just OK
customer_reviews.text: I had another dirt devil harwood vacuum before this, but the filter finally ripped after washing it many times, because i couldnt find a replacement. So, i ordered this one. Its okay, it does suck up dirt off of the floor. BUT, if anything at all gets stuck in the flap, which seems to be everytime i vacuum, all the dirt you sucked up just shoots back out at you from the bottom. I try to keep it clean and dump it every use, but you have stop stop while cleaning to dump it so that it doesnt end up back on the floor. I would not buy this particular vacuum again. I do like dirt devil brand usually though.
customer_reviews.author: Sterlin Arledge

customer_reviews.title: I like it and I don’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Had to get something cheep fast bc my vacuum busted. Pros: It’s got some suction! It get up all the cat hair off the floors and couch! Plus some. It comes apart to a hand vacuum. It’s light. Filter is super easy to clean. Cons: It’s flimsy. It can’t pick up some bigger items like pennies and torn up paper. (I have 2 cats and 2 kids. So things get spread fast) The cord is short. Over all I like it and I’ll continue to use it, till I can afford to buy another high end vacuum. But if you can swing something better now, get that before this.
customer_reviews.author: MoonRavven

customer_reviews.title: Economical Quick Cleanup Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The product was very easy to assemble. The suction is about what you would expect for a quick cleanup vacuum. Afterall it isn't a Dyson or Orek. I cleaned under my king size bed with it and it pulled up a lot of dust into the cup. The dust cup is surprisingly large as compared ro my Swifter. No problem with wrapping the cord, just leave enough slack in the cord to push it in so you can have room to keep wrapping. I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum did not even have enough suction to pick up the crumbs my toddler leaves behind. Had it for not even a month and I got one delivered before this one which I turned on once and it blew out and never turned on again. It was replaced but the second one I see still can’t do the job so I bought another brand for the sales price others say on reviews has way better suction than this one in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Toula

customer_reviews.title: This has very little suction
customer_reviews.text: My box was wet because it had rained and no one rang doorbell. I started putting it together and noticed that it was separated (cracked) and held together with tape. I tried testing it but it's too flimsy. I have another Dirt Devil upright vacuum that still works well despite it's 9-10 years but I can't find replacement filters. I'm returning this one to try to find the same kind of vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Igeorges1220

customer_reviews.title: The Little Dirt Devil That could-  Do it all,
customer_reviews.text: I love this light but powerful vacuum! This is my second one, but the first one still works. It fell off a moving truck and the handle broke so I bought another and kept the original as a hand vac. Great for its flexibility and after four years the original is just as powerful as the new one!
customer_reviews.author: BojoRadio

customer_reviews.title: Good for carpets, not great for hard floors or hair
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was great at first, and it's still pretty good for carpeted areas. After a few uses, it seemed to pick up significantly less I tried emptying it out, cleaning out the bottom, but it was still not as powerful as it initially was. Long strands of hair never really seem to get sucked in anymore and tile floors are a challenge. It does the job well on my carpets and it's size is great for getting into nooks and it fits perfectly on a stair. For the price, I think it's still a great vacuum but you aren't going to get a durable product at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Hate it hate it hate it.
customer_reviews.text: I originally started of by buying the $15.00 as soon as I received it I plugged it in and it started smoking. Ok so I returned it and figured it's cheap let me get the more expensive one for $25. 😑 it's almost completely the same and its HORRIBLE hardly vaccines a thing. Dont waste your money people.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Hecimovic

customer_reviews.title: Works for small areas!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my hardwood floors and also to use in my camper. The assembly was easy, once you read the directions. The first thing I noticed, as shown in pic 1, that there is a small gap but once you put the screws in it does close up. The material for the handle is a little flimsy. I used it in my kitchen and dinning room and it worked great. I used on my door mat and and worked great. Just not sure how the handle will hold up. I’ll update how it does in the camper the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had this exact one for about 4-5 years before I moved and didn't feel like bringing it with me. I've always lived in small places, studios, etc where I never made a huge mess but do have a 75 lb great dane mix. This little vacuum does what I need it to do! Of course if you want this as your main vacuum, obviously don't do it, but for my small random needs, plus the fact that you can take it apart, I love it. I was going between this one and a cordless one, but for the price jump to have no cord, I just figured to go with what I know and this is just fine for me!
customer_reviews.author: CorrieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for a couple of months and then junk
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: A clear plastic part in the front above the brushes just fell off (a corner of it chipped) and that renders it pretty much useless because that’s where the dirt is swept up into the chamber. It’s just been over two months. Cheap junk. I’ve used it every day for 2 months now to clean up after my cat...it has held up fine and is good for the basics. Don’t expect it to be able to suck up too much though - cat fur seems to be its limit.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Not to my liking
customer_reviews.text: Cord way to short if you want to vacuum you have to buy the right extension cord to make it longer so you wont have continue plug and unplug it to cover a whole area of one room you must do continuously empty so you wont ruien the motor .I'll be exhausted doing this 😅will be returning never turn it on .I took out the box right away I knew it wasnt for me .cute tho it's just wont do for the job I need done long cord little bit more powerfull
customer_reviews.author: Candle 🕯Light💡

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stick vacuum because of lack of space to store a regular one. I really did not expect much of it. However, I was surprised of how powerful it is. Or at least it does a good job intended in my apartment. The only problem I had was disengaging the dirt cup. It’s a little hard, but once you figure it out, you can do it. Just be careful the first time you try to do it since you do not want to break any part. I do recommend this vacuum for its efficiency and price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Old model was better - this is average
customer_reviews.text: I looooved the old model - that old reliable lasted me years and I bought it for my mom too. Decided to “upgrade” but this one doesn’t have suction as good as the old model and worst of all the stick that makes it upright keeps falling off the base which makes vacuuming a lot of fun. I find I have to sweep along the walls because the suction is too weak and doesn’t pull dirt unless you place this right on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic727

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this. It is so hard to get part off to empty dirt cup when you need to, then it comes off on its own when using vacuum spilling contents out. Suction is terrible. It is hard to wrap the cord around as "clips" that hold cord are not big enough to hold the cord and it is so hard to release the vacuum to use as hand held. Not user friendly at all. I had a $16 Bissell stick vacuum that worked better! Not one aspect of this vacuum I can recommend. Going to attempt to return.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Dondero

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy For Surface Cat Hair!
customer_reviews.text: This stick vac meets my needs perfectly! I was amazed at how much cat hair it pulled from on top of my carpet. I'd say my carpet is medium-pile, and I knew the vac did not have enough suction to get down into the pile...but I also knew there was a lot of cat hair that I couldn't see, as well as quite a bit that I can always see. I love that it's so lightweight and stands alone, and the cord has sufficient length.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not good for anything other than tile/laminate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our small office. The flooring is all laminate with the exception of a small area rug. We bring our dogs to work so the rug needs to be vacuumed weekly to remove the pet fur. I ready reviews from other people saying it worked well vacuuming carpet and rugs. Well I don't know if they're blind or have really low expectations, but this didn't do anything. The fur actually gets pushed to the front of the vac instead of going underneath the roller and getting sucked up into the canister. We have had no use to try the handheld dust buster feature. I'm sad we spent this money on a product that doesn't do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stick vacuum because i got vinyl floors and only have minimal carpet. This is light and easy to move around and will clean hard floors. The biggest selling point wad the rotating brush! I used it for the first time and was thinking this little vacuum wasn't strong enough. Its so light and small. Well, shut my mouth, at the end i looked in the basin and it was full of pet hair and debris! I changed my tune! Im impressed! Hopefully it will perform this well for awhile. I do recommend this item for quick clean ups!
customer_reviews.author: R. Koomjan

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: 1. Price point is good. But, 2. This machine doesn’t suction as well as previous models (although it is even louder); and 3. The hook, where the cord wraps, is in direct contact with where the cord comes out, from the machine. There is no easy way to wrap the cord, because the two parts are directly aligned, closing up the area where the cord goes. This version isn’t nearly as good as previous versions.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Pigott

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I usually enjoy these products but this one isn’t for me. I got it for its description and it sadly it’s all it describes. The suction isn’t great. Getting the front part to come off it’s almost impossible unless you bang it on something after you lock it in place and after using it a couple of times it loses it powerZ be cautious. Learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Shiimayne Brown

customer_reviews.title: RIP to my Vibe...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum since July of 2018 and she served me well. I use it in my craft room to suck up loose vinyl, glitter, sand, paper etc etc. For 25 bucks it did the damn thing! Picked up whatever I asked it to ❤️ I'm buying a new one RIGHT NOW!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: No good for tiles- canister won't fit tied
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they all like that,but this one work good on carpet but no on tiles floors.I am dessapointed because I have more tiles through the house ,only bedroom s are carpet. The dust canister doesn't close all the way through so succion it's no at 100 %. .work 75% good on carpet,no good for tile floors. I guess You get what You pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ada's Down To Earth Essentials

customer_reviews.title: good vacuum for small areas
customer_reviews.text: very vary small vacuum cleaner. Ideal for small spaces or a single person without heavy traffic in their area. It has good suction power but not for deep down dirt pick up. I have small children so crumbs and dirt are the daily. This picked up hair, crubs and dirt on the surface. I will have to get a larger more powerful vacuum in the near future. Also not that great on hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Cicely

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I basically got this so my kids can feel like they are cleaning. It picks up a good amount but not everything. It is nice for the inbetween day’s of deep cleans and for little kids to use. I haven’t ever used the handheld alone because the only thing I’d use it for is my van and I still haven’t found my extension cord to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This ‘vacuum’ is horrible. This is the second one I bought (had to return the first because I thought it was broken) only to find out the second one does the same exact thing. Every time you pick it up the whole dust collection container falls out of place and spills dirt/dust everywhere. Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Good for Small Deeds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a similar little vacuum I had for 9 years. I didn't know what I was getting because I have never been a fan of Dirt Devil vacuums. I was in for a surprise! I found this little vacuum was better than the one it replaced. It more than exceeded my expectations for small messes on hard surfaces and the area rugs I have in my home. It is great for use between the use of a heavy duty vacuum. I would say this is probably ideal if you live in a small apartment or rent a room. And I found it was not that costly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Rotating brush broke on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: I know this product has some mixed reviews but I was willing to give it a chance and was swayed by the low price. It is nice and light weight and did seem to pull up a decent amount of dust and cat hair from the carpet on the first run. On the second use though it started to make odd noises and then the rotating brush just stopped turning and I couldn't get it to work again. Luckily it broke quickly as there is a short return window on this product, so I was able to get my money back easily enough.
customer_reviews.author: S Turner

customer_reviews.title: CAUGHT ON FIRE
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I plugged this vacuum in it caught on fire about 3 minutes after I started vacuuming. Genuinely, actually caught on fire. There wasn't anything out of the ordinary on my rug that would have caused this. There was a small amount of flame. I turned it off and haven't plugged it back in since. It took me a while to use it so I missed my return window but I will not be using this vacuum again. I'm only giving it two stars because it was easy to assemble and did a good job cleaning my carpet until it caught on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Alexus

customer_reviews.title: Good basic vaccuum.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. (The first one got lost during a move) Great for dirt, dust, and lint. Not great for carpets. The carpet attachment doesn’t even turn (at least not inside of mine). Not sure what that’s about. But the filter is very easy to empty into the trash without spilling. The cord is long enough for me to move around the room
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best little Buddy
customer_reviews.text: Best little Buddy - I have mainly hardwood floors with several rugs and this little sweetheart has handled both beautifully. I like the fact that for such a small and light vacuum it has the rotating brush to pick up all kinds of debris on the rug. Unfortunately I tipped it over and the handle broke. so I made some 'arrangement' to fix the handle - it's Ok but I will also order another Dirt /Devil VIBE - not the Simply Stick which I found useless
customer_reviews.author: Petra K

customer_reviews.title: Terrible suction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to vacuum a small office with that really flat, hard carpet. Hair just got rolled up in the roller, and sand was only picked up when it was used as a hand vac - which takes way too long to do a whole floor space using the hand vac! I'm a play therapist and often need to vacuum sand off the carpet. The suction as a stick vacuum is absolutely awful. The hand vac feature has good suction when used with the attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is AMAZING the first few uses but you notice that within a week the way it ducks up trash has weakened and the motor begins making sounds like it’s going to go out. This is a replacement of a replacement so I’ve literally has 3 vacuum cleaners in 2 months. Y house is short carpet and hardwood and we don’t suck up hair or string or anything
customer_reviews.author: Nessahappyface

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Measure Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Dirt Devil Vibe Quick Path to replace my previous Dirt Devil Versa Power that stopped running after 7 or 8 years...I loved it for quick cleanups on my wood floors as well as my area rugs. This new Vibe is a far cry from the Versa. It has little pick up power even on hardwood floors. Also, the cord is heavier and the cord-wrap at the bottom is so close to the machine it is difficult to wrap. I am really disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Betty  J.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Used the vacuum 3 times and the belt stopped working. Wouldn't pick anything up. Called manufacturer and was told the belt was not under warranty. Bad purchase !!!! Thought Dirt Devil was a good product . Not so !! At least expected better service from the manufacturer. HRK
customer_reviews.author: HRK

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Because of chronic illness, I needed a lightweight vacuum that would easily pick up cat hair, and I didn't want to have to worry about a dying battery in a cordless vacuum. Dirt Devil products have always seemed to be really good, so I decided to try this. It works great! It easily picks up cat hair and litter, it's a cinch to empty, and removing cat hair from the roller brush is a breeze. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Veale

customer_reviews.title: Probably not what you're expecting
customer_reviews.text: Spend a little more and get something you will be satisfied with. This item isn't what it's cracked up to be. It's OK but you will wish you had spend a little more and got something else. This is a little cheesy and flimsey. You'll understand when the tiny box arrives. Easy to assemble but not great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even put this together. I’ve put together many appliances, but it didn’t line up well and fit. The handle felt thin & not sturdy. I never started it up. I returned it and got a more durable Dirt Devil.
customer_reviews.author: MjT

customer_reviews.title: Like the upgrades in the Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.text: We use stick vacums to clean in our vacation cabin rental. Had an earlier Dirt Devil that worked great but was a hassle pulling off the head to attach a crevice tool. We bought this model which is sturdier, has better suction and we like the detachable hand vac feature. As a quick vac product it works great, portable and great for our use needs.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraJ358

customer_reviews.title: Sucks & not in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small lightweight dual options for our camper. I wanted something small to fit into one of the cabinets and that I could use on both short carpet & vinyl flooring. It works decent on the carpet if you go over it 3-4 times but absolutely sucks on the vinyl flooring. It doesn’t vacuum up anything. I’ll keep looking for something better!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Carney

customer_reviews.title: One of the WORST vacuums ever
customer_reviews.text: No suction at ALL. I got the product and the first time I went to use it there were a few small crumbs on the carpet and I went over almost 10 times and they were still all there. When I put my hand up to the vacuum part, there is the weakest rush of air. it is completely ineffective rending it USELESS. I would give it 0 stars in every category if I could. Its basically resources and money. Im going to try and report it to the company and get my money back if all possible. This is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Detweiler

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, easy to clean, great for small jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Being a Senior citizen, the compact, light weight stick vac is very user friendly. It is perfect for daily use on my kitchen linoleum floors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rodani

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, nicely compact, but for our measly one rug that I use it to vacuum, it's pretty overwhelmed and doesn't do its job very well. Takes four or five passes sometimes to pick up the tiniest speck, and needs to be meticulously cleaned out after a couple uses for it to suck up anything. Handle broke off three times in three different places over the one year I've owned it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Arrien Zinghini

customer_reviews.title: Required title
customer_reviews.text: It does as much as I expected. It’s no dyson lol but it did pull a bunch of hair out of my rug. The brushes work but don’t stick out much at all so they don’t comb the carpet, probably due to a weak motor (at this price you can’t expect it to have much power). I only needed this for a small rug in my room so it’s perfect. If you have a whole room to vacuum then definitely get something meant for that.
customer_reviews.author: skittles

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My mom has been using this vacuum for years. She likes it cause it’s light weight and last a long time. When ever it starts acting up, I end up buying her a new one cause she doesn’t want a different one. Last one lasted about 6-7 years. Only down said is when hair gets caught up in the brush part. They should try to figure out a way that you can just take that part out to clean and cut the hair loose.
customer_reviews.author: Destinie Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well!
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Sucks well...so far. Love the versatility of It, how it can be a handheld vacuum as well. We use it in our cat room and it sucks up litter very well. Nice and lightweight. Works ok on carpet. Would definitely recommend my larger Shark vacuum for main vacuum jobs. But it does well for the reason we bought it. Only complaint is it vibrates my entire hand when using it. Kind of annoying. Other than that, works pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good on hardwood fl. Least 1y
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but it least just 1y, the brush roll stop working and it doesn’t work just for suction as well. It was good on hard wood floors but not much on carpets. I would buy another one because is really light weight, good for the hardwood floor area, I bought for $24, now it’s $34 + tax maybe I’ll check others options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than two months
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to finally purchase Dirt Devil Vibe, as it's hard to find a stick vacuum on which you can shut off the roller. I found it to be a little finicky on hard floors, not always picking up everything. Unfortunately, mine stopped working in less than two months. Fortunately, I have contacted Dirt Devil, and they will be replacing it! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Armchairshopper

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil 3 in 1
customer_reviews.text: After getting the product, I was disappointed. I was expecting much better quality of product and cleaning power. Its just plastic air sucker. Very flimsy, does not pick up the dirt very well, you have to go over the same spot several times to pick up the dirt/lint. It feels like its going to break in two any moment. It's not worth the money I paid for the item!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Marrer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I've had Dirt Devils break quickly, so I'm not making any guarantees - but so far so good! I've had this about a month now, and I've used it a handful of times, including in really, really dusty (think balls of dog hair and years of accumulated dust) places. I have a small studio, and it's perfect for that - obviously, it's not designed for vacuuming large apartments or houses. I often use the "handheld kitchen pickup" version when I want to get to all nooks and crannies. It's lightweight and small, which is very handy in cramped spaces. The suction power seems good for every-day needs like dust, hair, sand.
customer_reviews.author: Elina S

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly did not like this vacuum! Yes it is a cheap vacuum but the suction is awful! I would not recommend if your wanting to have a good one! It is very lightweight and I find myself using the hand held more than the vacuum itself because I have to constantly pull out things the vacuum caught underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my camper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to use in my camper. I wanted the type that works on floors and carpet. This is perfect for my needs. I know it doesn't have the same suction as a full blown vacuum cleaner would but it is better than being down on my hands and knees with a hand held vacuum. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Process

customer_reviews.title: Hairs Hairs Hairs
customer_reviews.text: The rotor gets useless after a couple of uses because the hair get stuck around it. I do not have a pet either. Totally useless rotor
customer_reviews.author: Dark Knight

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this vacuum cleaner and use it regularly due to its ease of use and light weight. I use it on both carpet and hard floor. It is perfect for picking up dust and any small particles. at first I thought it could be shotty because the attachment is basically a stick attached to the handheld part. However I am truly amazed and impressed with its performance. I use it mainly as an upright vacuum and have absolutely zero issues for over two months now. My place is clean and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not Great At Picking Up Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got to say, I’m not thrilled with this vacuum. I’d bought it to replace a battery operated one that broke. I thought with the rotating brush head it would be good. But I find I have to run it over the same spot numerous times to pick up cat litter and hair. I’m sure, when I’ve got extra money, I’ll get the battery operated vacuum I had before!
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully for about 5 minutes in total, then wouldn’t turn on again. I have a carpet floor classroom and got this to have something small I can vacuum up small things like spilled pencil sharpener dust, dirt kids track in, etc. SMALL particles. I used it by my classroom door after I put it together and was extremely impressed. I unplugged it, moved back to the door that leads outside, and it didn’t turn on. Tried a few different outlets and nothing. Waste of money! I did get to return the vacuum and was refunded which was awesome, but definitely upset that it didn’t last two uses
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Suction is great
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. Works great on my floors. And on my heavy carpet. It's great for a small apartment
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Barajas

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: I moved in to my new house (rented) and the floor was a mess, dirt everywhere and the dirtdevil cleaned it all! I sent a snapchat on the floor of the new house to my future roommate (who had already seen the house before) and he asked me if the landlord renewed it! It does wonders! Besides, it comes with a tinier part if you want to clean shelfs or couches and etc., so it cleans even better! There are three different types of strength for vacuuming (mild, medium and super strong) and they all clean everything! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Nakatani

customer_reviews.title: Quick cleanup stick just ok.
customer_reviews.text: My previous red Dirt Devil stick seemed to have more suction. The cord wrap is awkward as the cord exits the back right at the wrap hook. Easy to change debris container on front. Noisy as are most sticks. Good enough for quick kitchen cleanup on throw rugs. and stairs as well as viny/tile flooring. Not enough power for formal carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: Good in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Cleans ok enough for a little while. Size is convenient for small spaces and it's nice and lightweight. Sadly, I've found it pretty much disposable after 1-3 months (depending on how often you clean) both times I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: It be small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: So far so good picks up cat fur and grit just fine. It is basically a hand vacation with a handle and floor attachment or carpets and hard floors. The hand vac detaches and if you can use like a hand vac or keep rhe carpet attchment on and it is good for carpeted stairs. It is light and easy to handle and if you have a six year old who wants to vaccum no problem. One con it has short cord so you will need anot extension cord. There is also no hose for cleaning above your head. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ande

customer_reviews.title: I was impacted by the recent post Hurricane Harvey flooding ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impacted by the recent post Hurricane Harvey flooding and am temporarily living in a camp trailer on our property while our home is being restored. I needed a small vacuum for the trailer that didn't take up too much room since storage space is limited. The vacuum is quite functional for what I need to clean the flooring in the trailer and was simple to assemble but the handle is very flimsy and cannot put much pressure on it for fear it will snap or break the plastic. Couldn't imagine using it for a larger space but works for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McKelroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for area rugs, dorm rooms or studio apartments. It’s light weight, small and easy to store. The brush in it isn’t the best If you have animals so you may have to go over the area two or three times. When you use just the handheld part of it, you lose a lot of suction and doesn’t work nearly as good. I’ve had this vacuum for 4 months now, use it almost daily and it’s still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Webber

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have very good trust on Dirty Devil Vaccum Cleaning products. I used it many times and never have any complaints. Unfortunately, this one was not up to the expectations. I used it only one week back ever since it was purchased and all the time it was sitting in the box. I know that I cannot return the product now and have to purchasing another one is the only option but just want to share my experience here. Hopefully, it is not the case with all the Dirty Devil products and hope that they continue to live up to the expectation unlike this purchase. Cheers!!
customer_reviews.author: Ravi

customer_reviews.title: This is not the one :(
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is not great.... unless you want to use it as the hand portable type, then it is only ok. I wanted to use it on my vinyl floors and it scratches it and suction sucks (no punn intended). My grandmother had an older version and it worked great but the head was different.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for stairs and quick little messes.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I expected it to be for a dirt devil. For being a corded vacuum the suction should have been much stronger than what it is. Good for quick and easy little messes and works for the stairs
customer_reviews.author: J-L-Y 3

customer_reviews.title: Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vacuum daily since the day I got it and so far it does a pretty good job picking up small debris, dust, and hair all around the house. The brush roll definitely helps for light jobs on area rugs, and the dust cup is very easy to empty and clean. I wouldn't suggest using this on high pile or shaggy rugs unless you're cleaning a small mess in a specific area. Otherwise this is a great little vacuum for light jobs.
customer_reviews.author: David Mendiola

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap in price and they way it works and feels. It's very light weight, made of thin, cheap plastic. It's very light weight, made of thin, cheap plastic. It's okay for light cleaning but don't expect too much from it. If you want a good clean this isn't the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was inexpensive and I wanted to clean up cat little in a jiffy. I started vacuuming around the little box and ended up doing the whole house. This little did better than what my big old expensive vacuum usually does. It's super lightweight which makes stairs and moving quickly a breeze. Only dislike is the cord isn't very long but I definitely reccomend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum head doesn't stay down
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the vacuum and tried it out. Very lightweight and compact. However the vacuum head does not stay down when you pull back towards you. It did not seem to have much suction either. I really can't think of an application for this vacuum. I bought it for our RV since it is a small area. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Not great on rug
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean my classroom rug weekly. It doesn’t work best on a rug, but works great on the classroom floor. Could be the type of rug I have? I’m not sure. It still works on the rug- just not AMAZING on a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Allie O

customer_reviews.title: So pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for one without the brush and it's wonderful. My cat has long hair and it picked it up so well, I was amazed. I'm handicapped and it's so easy to use. I do really clean it after use, so I'm rather a fussy person . I like to take care of what I have. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: connie g.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for someone with a pet.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my apartment. All faux-wood laminate flooring and one area rug. Picks up the dust, dirt, cat litter, fur, and etc. Easy to empty. One down side is it does blow out dust if the filter gets too much fur around it, so I have to empty multiple times in one cleaning session. UPDATE: I've had this vacuum for a couple of months now. It's pretty much done. It's great if you have not pets, I'm sure, but it can't keep up with the fur of my one cat. It was done after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Lyanne

customer_reviews.title: Super little machine.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. I have it upstairs so I don't have to carry the larger one up and down the stairs. It is perfect for stairs too. I'm getting another to keep in the basement! Easy to store behind a door or in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil 3-in-1 is BEST BEST BEST Stick Vacuum.  I mean it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a new, large, high-quality vacuum in my utility room, but I unfailingly turn to this for quick touch-ups prior to mopping my tile, and for vacuuming my many throw rugs. It does a perfect job, yet doesn't suck the rug into the vacuum -- which my overly efficient large model does. I do not need or want to wrestle with a heavy machine to do my gorgeous knotted rugs or charming rag rugs -- so this is my favorite appliance. I have ordered another one for my 86-year-old mom, because she does not have the strength to shove her heavy, expensive vacuum across her carpet, and there is no adjustment on her machine to accommodate for plush carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum has no business being as good as it is for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, how can a vacuum this inexpensive work so well? We have a small place with laminate flooring, so only bought this for the area rugs, furniture, and small cleanup. Extremely happy with the quality of the vacuum, ease of use and switching from upright to handheld. Easy to clean out without making a huge mess too!
customer_reviews.author: Bill of Rights

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like this its light and works pretty good for those days you just want to vacuum a small area. It won't suck a golf ball thru a 10 feet of garden hose but it works in my garage for dust and sand that would eventually end up in the house. It doesn't suck like a $2,000 Kirby! But it sucks for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Thekeithfan

customer_reviews.title: Lacks power and quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, easily maneuverable and simple to use, but lacks sufficient power to pickup small debris off hard floor surfaces, especially without the brush engaged and allows some debris to bypass the filter and spill on the floor when emptying the dirt cup. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MAJORSDAD

customer_reviews.title: Good price/function combo
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum is good for the price. Using it has a hand vac requires removing the handle and the powered head which is a little more work than a quick snap-off design. The power of the vacuum has been more than I expected and got a good amount of dirt. It works well on hard wood floors and shorter carpets. Plush carpets are a little harder to push it on, but it still works. I prefer my more expensive vacuum for heavy jobs, but this is nice for smaller quick pick-ups. Overall, I don't think you can get a better deal for a vacuum with a powered brush.
customer_reviews.author: Anteater

customer_reviews.title: Stop picking up after third time using
customer_reviews.text: Nice as far as storage space it worked well first time; it’s great for Very light cleaning. After third use I end up sweeping. Using Broom Is better It won’t pick up anything terrible and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Iamarichgirl2

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t have much suction and the roller on the bottom doesn’t even turn to help. I wouldn’t recommend it at all very disappointed in the dirt devil as I’ve had their products before and was happy with them but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use in our RV. Although the size was great, it really didn’t have very good suction. Also, it was made of very flimsy plastic... you get what you pay for! Amazon kindly honored my return request.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Melody

customer_reviews.title: Versatile stick vacuum with separate settings for carpets and bare floors.
customer_reviews.text: This is a stick vacuum that has separate settings for bare floors and carpets. It has brushes to use on ccarpets which can be turned off for cleaning bare floors. The switch is located a little awkwardly, but not all that difficult to use . It also becomes a handheld vacuum and comes with an attachment for edging. Bare floor cleaning is excellent. Carpet cleaning is OK, but not as effective as the bare floor setting. Its versatility at such an affordable price earns my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard floors
customer_reviews.text: What I really like is how easy it is to switch between the hard floor setting and the carpet setting. It does a really good job on the hard floors. I also vacuumed my car with the handheld attachment and felt that it worked very well. I haven't tried vacuuming carpeted steps yet!
customer_reviews.author: KittyChick

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other vacuums with double the cost
customer_reviews.text: Although I expected the product to be bigger (I'm glad it is more compact) it fits perfectly in my cleaning closet. It wasn't difficult to assemble and easy to take apart and clean. Suction is great, sucking up practically everything on the first push of the vacuum. The price and the quality of the vacuum gets high praise from me.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Vac
customer_reviews.text: For the amount I paid, I am pleasantly surprised. I have used this vacuum in the house (rooms, stairs, floors) and the car. The vacuum also sucks up my dogs hair well and doesn't get clogged. I am impressed with the quality of the suction and size of the bag. I am able to clean the filter easily and swap between hand held and full vacuum mode.
customer_reviews.author: Orion von Hubel

customer_reviews.title: Best for small cleaning jobs.
customer_reviews.text: I would of liked a stronger suction, but then it doesn’t cost all that much. I guess I should just use it for quick clean-ups, and give it a rating of 5 cause that is what its good for, for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, next.
customer_reviews.text: I have a few problems with this guy. The handle splits automatically when you put in the screws. The handle itself doesn’t stay in the vacuum well. The suction isn’t very strong and it wouldn’t pick up most of the Cheerios that are on the floor daily in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: This Vacuum cleaner is for people without dirt LOL
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats 2 kids and 2 small areas with carpet and this barely does the trick. it got backed up after a week but after we cleaned out thoroughly -- had to go into the machine to pull out the dust and dirt -- it's working again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great handheld with handle.. floor attachment is pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: First of all i know this is a cheap item as i didnt pay much for it. I really just needed it for the vinyl wood plank in the basement and the stairs. The floor piece is pretty worthless in my opinion. I tried to pick up cat litter and it ended up moving single pebbled instead of sucking it up. I tried bare floor and brissel option. Personally for the price i think its ok and i am leaving the handle on and just use the handheld attachment. That piece works perfect. Cleaning the filter is a pain but it does work well.
customer_reviews.author: Patryk

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!! 😡 CHEEPER THAN CHEAP!!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for!!. After using two times I ended up going on Facebook and getting a three hundred dollar vacuum for the price I got this one for.. dam thing couldn't even suck up a crumb of cat litter 🤦🏾‍♂️.. DON'T BUY THIS YOU'LL BE DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this vacuum cleaner only a three because I bought two and one stopped working right away. I didn’t realize that a month had gone by. exactly 32 days had passed so I wasn’t able to send it back. I don’t think the 30 day deadline for returns are fair. That vacuum cleaner was used only once before it stopped working. The second one I bought works fine and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: kaybaily

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces. This isn’t intended to replace a full-size vacuum. I love that it comes apart and can be a handheld vacuum. I’ve had this vacuum about a year now and it has held up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, awkward, and questionable suction.
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of ear plugs? You may need them. I couldn't believe the noise when I turned it on for the first time. So... I figured with that much noise it had to be literally sucking up the flooring. Oh no, not this little beauty! Leave behinds are frequent and without the spinning brush one could do better with a broom and dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Martin

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil SD20020 Vibe 3-in-1 Vacuum Cleaner, Lightweight Corded Bagless Stick Vac with Handheld, Red
product_meta.description: Size:SD20020| Color:RedThe Dirt Devil Vibe Stick Vacuum is designed with you in mind. The lightweight design is easily portable for all your small messes. With on/off brush roll you can conveniently move from carpets to hard floors at the touch of a button.
feature_bullets: Lightweight design - Easy transportation from room-to-room and up-and-down stairs. Motor watts - 240 watts
On/off brushroll - Turn brushroll 'on' for carpeted surfaces and 'off' for hard floor cleaning
Easy empty dirt cup - Makes emptying the dirt cup easy and mess-free
Hand vac - Detach the nozzle and neck in a snap for when you need a quick hand vacuum
10" nozzle - Provides a path for quick clean-ups. Scatter guard - Yes; Safety rated: ETL

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars4,668 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
